text:
:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!

Hey there :wave:
Is there a dedicated channel for the <https://www.HubSpot.com/products/crm/live-chat|live chat>? Where should I ask questions about the live chat integration?

Hello, I need help. I have a static UL list created in HTML/CSS, and I need to make that list a rich text, but without making each LI element a rich text. Instead, I need to make the entire UL list a rich text, while keeping the links that are present in the LI elements. Can someone explain to me how to do that?
